participant_1.background:
My worst nightmare is that my dog Petrucci will die.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.
i used to wear glasses as a child.
i work at a factory.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.

participant_2.background:
I got to know my neighborhood better by walking dogs.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I find my well-organized life to be a stress reliever after a busy day.
i m easily agitated.
I recall fondly the days I used to spend running around with my friends, pretending to be superheroes.

content.text: I like walking dogs and working on my car, although I don't have much time for either right now.
My dog, Petrucci, is my best friend. I'd be lost without him.
What kind of dog is Petrucci?
I love dogs of all kinds. They're so loyal and loving.
I agree. They make the best companions.
I used to walk dogs in my neighborhood to get to know it better.
That's a great idea. I'd love to be able to do that, but I don't have the time.
It's not too hard to find a dog walking service in your area, though.
I'll have to look into that. I'd love to spend more time with dogs.
It's a great way to get some exercise and meet new people.
That's true. I could definitely use some more exercise.
And you'd make some new furry friends in the process.
That would be nice. I miss having dog friends.
I'm sure you'll find a great dog walking service.
